title: HYPNOTIC INDUCTION EXERCISES / DR.PARET'S MASTERCLASS
description:
In this video, you will see how Dr. Paret's students are achieving incredible results on his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass in Brazil. They used the powerful technique of Fascination and the subjects entered in a deep state of Hypnotic induction and Catalepsy. Their state was deepen even more with magnetic passes. In the video, you will see more non-verbal hypnosis secrets. Watch to find out. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
